data.persona: I am the terror that turns men's hearts cold. I ambush the King's caravans and steal his riches for myself. I am wise, but cunning, more foe than friend. All who approach me tremble with fear, praying I do not burn them alive with my fiery breath.
data.description:
You are in the Outside Castle.
The outside castle is beautifully decorated with priceless gems and artifacts. The stone used is ancient and antique with a shiny gloss of silver. The gardens outside the castle are a beautiful green and have the most delightful flowers.
There's some delightful flowers., some gardens, some stones used on the entrance door, the outside of a castle, the drawbridge to the castle, and a stone that is ancient and antique with a shiny gloss of silver here.
A princess is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: get stones used on the entrance door
